entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Stony Rapids
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:26 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -12.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stony Rapids Airport 10:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -12.0°C
Pressure: 100.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -13.7°C
Wind: W 15 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 10.
